posts.subject: Image Viewing
posts.body:
Are images optional files here? Is there a way to auto-censor to avoid automatically downloading them while scrolling?

Just want to stay safe while I support this lovely site. Probably should make such a system default.

Edit: Figured it out. It's "spoiler thumbnails" and "always spoiler" in the options. You can also change "images preview" to 0 to hide the spoiler images as well.
